system.description: Effect: Poison tipped spikes are spread over the [Blast X] area on standing surfaces. A creature that starts an Activation on a surface containing the Hazard gains Poison 1. A creature that moves through through a space touching a surface containing the Hazard gain Poison 1 for each square travelled. After gaining 4 Stacks of Poison this way during the same Round, the creature's Poison Affliction becomes Blight.
